suggestions.original: To improve the realism of the artwork, consider focusing on the following aspects: 1. Proportions: Ensure that the characters' body parts are proportionate to each other. For example, the heads and eyes are currently too large compared to the rest of the body. 2. Textures and Details: Add more detailed textures to the clothing and skin to make them appear more lifelike. 3. Shading and Lighting: Incorporate shading and lighting to give the characters and objects a three-dimensional appearance. 4. Perspective: Work on the perspective to ensure that the characters and objects interact with the environment in a consistent and realistic manner. 5. Facial Features: Make the facial features more realistic by reducing exaggeration and adding more detail. 6. Background: Add a more detailed background to provide context and depth to the scene. By addressing these areas, the artwork can achieve a more realistic and engaging depiction.
